entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: All deep cover assignments for Mark Hieks have been completed successfully.  Monitoring of the A.C.L.O. computers will greatly enhance the N.S.H.'s efforts to slow down A.C.L.O. aide to the Rebel Alliance.
entries.journal_entry_description: Mark Hieks needs monitoring devices attached to several key A.C.L.O. computers.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Galiir Ac Yandar requires that contact with a deep cover agent, Mark Hieks, within the A.C.L.O. office be made and assistance rendered.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Having injured himself to avoid suspicion, the deep cover agent for N.S.H. is unable to complete his current mission.  Mark has asked that electronic monitoring devices be placed on four key computer systems within the A.C.L.O.  He waits in the medical office inside the A.C.L.O. base.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: All of the computers have been tapped.  Report back to Mark Hieks for further instructions.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Place a monitoring device on the A.C.L.O. equipment manifest computer.  It is located in the storage room on the first floor.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Place a monitoring device on the A.C.L.O. medical computer.  It is located across the way in the medical bay.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Place a monitoring device on the A.C.L.O. personnel computer.  It is located in the living quarters up stairs.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Place a monitoring device on the A.C.L.O. operations computer.  It is in the central control room at the top of the stairs.
